page.title: 05 First year's view.
page.content: When I first came to the school,the environment was very different from my junior school.Everything was so big.It did not take long for me to get used to the many classrooms and timetable.We do homework but I do not like it when I have to give it in the next day. School dinners are very nice.You can have anything you want.There is a menu but you can order a special.There is a variety of confectionary and puddings. We have many more subjects than in my primary school.Craft is fun.I like history and science.I cannot wait till we do experiments with chemicals.Games are good but I get tired after swimming Ido not like changing classrooms and walking from one end of the school to the other in the rain I come from outside the catchment area because my parents heard it is a good school.I am glad I came here.
